edu.washington.cs.handsfreelibrary.sensors
Class ClickSensor

java.lang.Object
  edu.washington.cs.handsfreelibrary.sensors.ClickSensor

public abstract class ClickSensor
extends java.lang.Object

Class ClickSensor is an abstract base class to all other click sensors. It defines a list of click listeners, as well as the basic methods used by outsiders to add and remove listeners. Classes derived from ClickSensor may use the protected onSensorClick to call all the listeners at once.

Author:
Leeran Raphaely

removeListener

public void removeListener(edu.washington.cs.handsfreelibrary.sensors.ClickSensorListener listener)
Removes a listener so it will no longer be called when a click is perceived.

Parameters:
listener - the ClickSensorListener to be removed

Returns true if listener is currently listening for clicks from this.

public void clearListeners()
Removes all listeners from this.

onSensorClick

protected void onSensorClick()
To be called by a derived class all listeners should have their onSensorClick methods called.
